```]add IntervalConstraintProgramming@v0.12.1```

text: the version numbers are recorded in `Manifest.toml`.  in `Project.toml` there are only `[compat]` bounds, which are handled manually, `Pkg` won't touch those

elements.text: the version numbers are recorded in

text: in case you are interested, with a quick `git diff` it seems that `Manifest.toml` already had the latest version of the package marked there, so maybe that's because `]up` did not work? No idea why it was using the older version though :thinking_face: . Anyway, I am happy it is updated now :smile:
